summary: Brand name text is updated in key UI components (NavBar, Footer, About) and the inquiry success UI no longer shows a link/button to sent/received inquiries. The inquiry hook now clears the prior localStorage key and appears to submit via a backend mutation instead of persisting locally. However, the diff does not provide clear evidence that the #/received-inquiries route is no longer accessible, nor that form submission is actually blocked/disabled while the backend actor is still loading.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace "The Stories By Vows" with exactly "The Stories Behind VOWS" across the entire site UI (all user-facing occurrences, case-insensitive).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows several updated occurrences, but does not provide evidence for all user-facing occurrences across the entire UI (e.g., other sections/pages not shown here).

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove/disable the #/received-inquiries route so it is no longer accessible from the public UI (navigating to #/received-inquiries should not show the prior inquiries table page).
missing_requirements.reason: While App.tsx shows no routing logic and the navbar no longer includes a My Inquiries link, the diff does not show any routing configuration change (e.g., removal of a route mapping) and the ReceivedInquiriesPage file is still present (no content shown). Therefore it is not evidenced that direct navigation to #/received-inquiries is prevented or falls back to a not-found/public view.

missing_requirements.requirement: Prevent inquiry submission while the backend actor is still loading/unavailable (block submission/disable submit) so normal use does not produce the failure message.
missing_requirements.reason: ContactSection computes an `isActorReady` flag, but the provided (truncated) content does not show it being used to disable/block form submission or prevent `handleSubmit` from being called when the actor is unavailable.

hallucinated_features.description: Removed/omitted other site sections/pages (e.g., Portfolio/Pricing/Packages) from the main rendered app layout.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks for brand text changes, removal of the My Inquiries experience, and fixing inquiry submission/localStorage behavior. It does not request removing other sections from the site. App.tsx now renders only Home/About/Contact and Footer.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed footer copyright year and added an external "caffeine.ai" credit link.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest requirements; appears to be an additional content change.
